uvva.test package

Submodules

uvva.test.test_rm_config_files module

Tests validating the accessibility of configuration files relevant to run the ResourceManager class.

uvva.test.test_rm_config_files.test_global_paths()

Tests folder structure of the repository.

uvva.test.test_rm_config_files.test_load_env()

Tests if environment config file exists.

uvva.test.test_rm_config_files.test_load_metadata()

Tests if the listed config files of the ResourceManager can be parsed with the YAML package and are successfully stored as sub-dictionaries of the metadata dictionary
